main event: Three bright red-orange lights were observed in the sky traveling erratically over New Milford, Connecticut on November 9, 1965.
interesting points: The lights were seen passing overhead at a high rate of speed,The sighting lasted approximately 1-1/2 to 2 minutes,There was no audible sound detected during the sighting,The lights moved in an erratic course,The witness filled out a detailed questionnaire about the sighting.
witness description: The witness has a strong desire to observe and understand unusual objects and has had other similar sightings.
